sentences:
Sentence 0:
Under optimum hydrolysis conditions, 0.685 g/g of reducing sugar was produced per gram of pretreated biomass.

Sentence 1:
The fermentation of the hydrolyzate using Saccharomyces cerevisae produced 11.365 g/L of bioethanol with an efficiency of about 50%.
sentence_raw: Under optimum hydrolysis conditions, 0.685 g/g of reducing sugar was produced per gram of pretreated biomass.
The fermentation of the hydrolyzate using Saccharomyces cerevisae produced 11.365 g/L of bioethanol with an efficiency of about 50%.
